Welcome! Take a moment to check +GuildsOfSubstance and +Guilds . They're directories of some of the best guilds in the site so you can choose the ones you like according to your hobbies.

Also shout out +Books where you can discuss 1984. Indeed it is a great book alongside Brave New World. Currently we're discussing The Lies of Locke Lamora as a cross over even with +AskSciFi

body:
Welcome to Ruqqus! If you'd like to discuss Ruqqus itself, check out +Ruqqus! If you'd like, you can also try checking out some of the settings of the site [here](https://ruqqus.com/settings). I hope you enjoy your stay here!

Note: If you don't like mod censorship, try to stay away from +TheMemery and +RealNews. They're modded by a notorious powermod, milkit, who frequently exiles (bans) users.

Second note: If you post in +general, your posts can get yanked to other guilds. Recently, a group of users have been yanking tons of posts into tiny guilds like +communism101. If that happens, you can remove your post from that guild by clicking the "Remove from +<guildname>" button.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
Welcome to Ruqqus! If you'd like to discuss Ruqqus itself, check out +Ruqqus! If you'd like, you can also try checking out some of the settings of the site here. I hope you enjoy your stay here!

Note: If you don't like mod censorship, try to stay away from +TheMemery and +RealNews. They're modded by a notorious powermod, milkit, who frequently exiles (bans) users.

Second note: If you post in +general, your posts can get yanked to other guilds. Recently, a group of users have been yanking tons of posts into tiny guilds like +cOmMUnISm101. If that happens, you can remove your post from that guild by clicking the "Remove from +<guildname>" button.

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]

body: I rarely delete comments. It mostly happens in one of three situations: 1. It's a test comment, 2. I posted it in the wrong place, or 3. I decided that I didn't like the comment within about 5 minutes after posting it

body: Yup, u/maxwellhill - she was in charge of /worldnews and /politics I believe - among many other. She was invited to the general meetings, schmoozing her way up with the top CEOs, etc. Her very last post on Reddit was a couple hours before her arrest, sharing a news story about the fact "somebody" had just transferred a billion dollars in bitcoins, visible on the blockchain. Not coincidental.
